titles: The grounds of that doctrine which is according to godlinesse. Or a briefe and easie catechisme (gathered out of many other) with graces and prayers for them that want better helps. By T.V. B. of D. Vicar of Cockfield in Southser.
author: Vicars, Thomas, d. 1638.
publisher: Printed by T.C[otes] and R.C[otes] for Michael Sparke, dwelling at the blue Bible in Greene Arbor,
notes: Reproduction of original in the Durham University Library.
